docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, May 28.--The Brazilian Chamber today passed the first reading of the Government measure revoking Brazil's neutrality in the war between Germany and the United States. The vote was 136 to 3.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, May 28.--The Brazilian Chamber today passed the first reading of the Government measure revoking Brazil's neutrality in the war between Germany and the United States. The vote was 136 to 3.
docs.abstract: Chamber of Deputies passes revocation of neutrality decree, comment by Chilean Diario Illustrado

headline.main: Brazilian Chamber Votes for War, 136 to 3; Chileans Eager to Join Us Against Germany

docs.snippet: THE tendency in modern warfare is to alleviate its hardships and its multiplying horrors, notwithstanding the efforts of civ  ilized nations to excel in preparedness for war either in defense of sacred rights or for self-aggrandizement.

headline.main: 'RIPPER'S' MARK FOUND ON BODY OF RUTH CRUGER; Autopsy Shows Death Due to Crushing of Skull and Fiendish Use of a Long Knife. NO ACCOMPLICE SUSPECTED Efforts Bent Upon Getting Cocchi Back from Italy--Swannto Ask Wilson's Help.POLICE UNDER 3 INQUIRIESMrs. Cocchi and Two Others Held-- No Motor Cycle PolicemanImplicated. Swann to Appeal to Wilson. Adds to Mystery of Police Failure. FIND RIPPER'S MARK ON RUTH CRUGER Skull Bone Still Missing. Will Fight Slave Traffic. Hope for Extradition.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, July 12.--The American squadron arrived here at 4 o'clock yesterday afternoon. It was escorted into the harbor by Uruguayan warships. The President of the Committee of Foreign Affairs of the Chamber of Deputies met the squadron and...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, July 12.--The American squadron arrived here at 4 o'clock yesterday afternoon. It was escorted into the harbor by Uruguayan warships. The President of the Committee of Foreign Affairs of the Chamber of Deputies met the squadron and invited the officers and men to come ashore.
docs.abstract: squadron under Admiral Caperton given fete at Montevideo

headline.main: URUGUAY HAILS OUR NAVY.; Fete In Montevideo Marks Visit of Caperton's Squadron.
